title: Homepage UI updates: hero CTA removal, Our Approach card redesign, How It Works number layout

requirements.summary: Remove the secondary "Contact Us Today" CTA from the homepage hero so only "Schedule a Consultation" remains, cleaning up related logic.
acceptanceCriteria: In HeroSection, the button with label "Contact Us Today" is no longer rendered.
Hero layout remains visually balanced on mobile and desktop with a single CTA button.
No unused handler/function remains for the removed button (e.g., contact button click handler is removed if no longer needed).

file_operations.description: Remove the "Contact Us Today" button from the hero CTA row and delete the now-unused handler/functionality tied to that CTA; adjust spacing/alignment as needed so the single remaining CTA still looks balanced across breakpoints.

requirements.summary: Redesign "Our Approach" cards: replace numbers with icons, enforce white card background, apply permanent gold theme border, and add subtle press (active) upward-lift without border color changes.
acceptanceCriteria: Each Our Approach card no longer displays the numeric text (1–4) and instead displays an icon per card.
Our Approach cards render with a white background in light mode (and remain legible in dark mode).
Our Approach cards have a gold border derived from the existing accent/gold theme token (not a newly introduced hard-coded random gold).
The gold border remains gold in default, hover, focus, and active/clicked states (no border color change on click).
Clicking/tapping a card triggers a subtle upward-lift effect (e.g., small translateY negative) and returns to normal when released; effect works on desktop and mobile.

file_operations.description: Update the four Our Approach cards to swap the numeric labels for icons (use existing site-consistent icon style, e.g., lucide-react), switch card surface to a white-in-light-mode token (e.g., card background) with dark-mode legibility, set a permanent border using the existing gold accent token (e.g., border-accent) and remove any hover/active border color changes, and add a subtle active/click lift interaction via transform/transition (e.g., active:-translate-y-1) that resets on release.

requirements.summary: Adjust "How It Works" steps so numbers are outside the bordered card and apply a gold theme border to each step text box.
acceptanceCriteria: In HowItWorksSection, the step number is visually outside/separate from the step card/box (not inside the card content container).
The layout preserves the existing step titles and order (1 through 5).
Each step’s text box/card has a gold border using the site’s existing accent/gold theme token.
The section remains responsive and readable on mobile and desktop without overlapping number + card content.

file_operations.description: Restructure each step’s markup so the number is rendered as its own element outside (preceding) the bordered Card/text container, with layout that keeps number first then the box; apply a gold border using the existing accent token on the Card (e.g., border-accent) and ensure responsive spacing/alignment prevents overlap on mobile and desktop.
